data.candle_lighting_minutes_before_sunset: Number of minutes before sunset for candle lighthing
data.havdalah_minutes_after_sunset: Number of minutes after sunset for havdalah (0 - use the time for Tzet Hakochavim)
data.language: Show holidays and dates in english (latin) or hebrew
data.latitude: Override the default latitude value set by Home Assistant
data.longitude: Override the default longitude value set by Home Assistant
data.name: The name to be used for the sensors
